overview: WCW hits the road and heads to Sturgis, South Dakota for Road Wild '99. Hulk Hogan defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against Kevin Nash in a Retirement Match. "Macho Man" Randy Savage battles "The Worm" Dennis Rodman. Goldberg faces Rick Steiner. Sid Vicious goes one-on-one with Sting. Plus, Rey Misterio Jr., Eddy Guerrero, and much more!
title: WCW Road Wild 1999
